Posts.EditableText: You can open it in a text editor to correct bad XML, while opening it in Internet Explorer might help you find where the error, if the error did not give a line number (and sometimes the line number is the last line because it could not find something, which is no help at all).
Posts.HTML: You can open it in a text editor to correct bad XML, while opening it in Internet Explorer might help you find where the error, if the error did not give a line number (and sometimes the line number is the last line because it could not find something, which is no help at all).
